passwordReset.emailNotFound: Email not found. Please contact check@meedan.com for support.
passwordReset.emailNotValid: Please enter a valid email address.
passwordReset.confirmedText: We've sent you an email from admin@checkmedia.org with instructions to reset your password. Make sure it didn't wind up in your spam mailbox. If you aren't receiving our password reset emails, contact check@meedan.com.
passwordReset.title: Forgot password
passwordReset.text: Happens to everybody! Add your address and an email will be sent with further instructions.
